title: Transportation Plan&Dsgn
description: Introduction to transportation engineering with specific emphasis on the planning, design, and operation of transportation facilities.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CEE 1770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 1770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or EGR 1770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or AE 1770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
